contents: "Apr 13, 2022 - Electric vehicles at N.Y. auto show, The New York International Auto Show is back this year after two years of COVID-related cancellations. Several electric vehicles will be on display, including the Ford F-150 Lightning, an all-electric pickup truck. The truck's chief engineer, Linda Zhang, spoke with Anne-Marie Green and Vladimir Duthiers on CBS News about the future of electric vehicles."
